lines.text: You know it's going to take a lot more than you can carry in that knapsack to get you through all of this.
Well, the bag is not for what I take Colson. It is for what I find along the way.
Blow an opening? With what? Don't tell me you know how to make a bomb out of a stick of chewing gum.

[MacGyver is trying to disarm a missile he accidentally triggered]
Alright hotshot, so you got a golden palomino between your knees, and NO reins. Now what?

[voice-over narration]
It's funny, you know, the kind of stuff that pops into your head when you're trying to work. I remember there was this horse... a golden palomino. Ol' Man McGinny had got him in a trade, I think. I couldn't of been much more than nine or ten, at the time, but I made up my mind I was going to ride that horse. Course, knowing Ol' Man McGinny, that was going to take some doing.
A phenomenal shot by a short kid! The fans go crazy!
